ComicInfo.Summary: Adventure The First: Grievous Angel: Doc Samson -- a psychiatrist strongman to super-heroes and a psychiatric liaison to S.H.I.E.L.D.-- helps his goddaughter Tina find her parents after they've been kidnapped by a ghost of an old friend and the Living Totem.
